trans-unit.source: Authoring DSC configurations in Windows PowerShell ISE is much easier, thanks to the following improvements:
trans-unit.target: Authoring DSC configurations in Windows PowerShell ISE is much easier, thanks to the following improvements:

trans-unit.source: List all DSC resources within a **configuration** block or **node** block by entering **Ctrl+Space** on a blank line within it.
trans-unit.target: List all DSC resources within a **configuration** block or **node** block by entering **Ctrl+Space** on a blank line within it.

trans-unit.source: Automatic completion on resource properties that are of the **enumeration** type.
trans-unit.target: Automatic completion on resource properties that are of the **enumeration** type.

trans-unit.source: Automatic completion on the **DependsOn** property of DSC resources, based on other resource instances in the configuration.
trans-unit.target: Automatic completion on the **DependsOn** property of DSC resources, based on other resource instances in the configuration.

trans-unit.source: Better tab completion of resource property values.
trans-unit.target: Better tab completion of resource property values.

trans-unit.source: **Note:** You must have an empty string for resource property values before you can use Ctrl+Space to list the options.
trans-unit.target: **Note:** You must have an empty string for resource property values before you can use Ctrl+Space to list the options.
